description: Stanford brand bar with the wordmark logo that links to the Stanford homepage. The brand bar sits at the very top of a website.

modifiers.name: .su-brand-bar--bright
modifiers.description: White wordmark on bright red background

modifiers.name: .su-brand-bar--dark
modifiers.description: White wordmark on dark grey background

modifiers.name: .su-brand-bar--white
modifiers.description: Cardinal red wordmark on white background
